# [Metaframe](https://metapages.org/): observe and manipluate input data streams

[![](https://mermaid.ink/svg/pako:eNo1j7sOwjAMRX8l8kx_IAMTbHSBsWEwjUsjNQ8ljhCq-u-kJL2Lratz_Vhh9JpAwjtimMXtrpwoMi5kTqLrzqKvTsqvilhinCJaqv6ufkiz_xwhdFoETEl496wMOV2b_j_RZ97BoVWRyjCBqeVbBk5gKVo0uhy37p4CnqmsBVlaTRPmhRUotxU0B41MV23YR5ATLolOgJn94-tGkBwzHdDFYHnENmr7AZ1qVRA)](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/edit#pako:eNo1j7sOwjAMRX8l8kx_IAMTbHSBsWEwjUsjNQ8ljhCq-u-kJL2Lratz_Vhh9JpAwjtimMXtrpwoMi5kTqLrzqKvTsqvilhinCJaqv6ufkiz_xwhdFoETEl496wMOV2b_j_RZ97BoVWRyjCBqeVbBk5gKVo0uhy37p4CnqmsBVlaTRPmhRUotxU0B41MV23YR5ATLolOgJn94-tGkBwzHdDFYHnENmr7AZ1qVRA)


This metaframe inspects and can manipulate metapage data streams.

 - will pass along all data inputs as the same outputs
 - allow pausing and pushing
 - saving and caching
 - provide metrics: messages/sec and data/sec

## Examples

[ðŸ‘‰ Emit random numbers and plot ðŸ”—](https://app.metapages.org/#?&minimal=false)
